name: The Outer Planets: Legacy Of Ganymede Station - Part 1
name_original: The Outer Planets: Legacy Of Ganymede Station - Part 1
description:
Made in 72 hours for Ludum Dare 46 - “Keep it Alive” using the wonderful, codeless Bitsy editor.

I used the Bitsy editor, without any hacks. You can make your own little worlds and adventures too! Here’s a link - https://ledoux.itch.io/bitsy

I hope to make more in the future!

Ludum Dare 46

There are many hundreds of games made during this gamejam. You can take part in the effort to play and rate them! You can rate this game on the game page here: https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/46/adventure-of-dome

Stay safe folks.

CREDITS

Art, Words - Darren Kearney

THANKS

Bitsy Discord Community, especially MaddyFlen for the bitsy tips at a cruicial moment! Thank you <3
